values.NAME_ASC: Sort alphabetically on the name of the asset, in ascending order. Default.
values.NAME_DESC: Sort alphabetically on the name of the asset, in descending order.
values.ACTIVITY: Sort assets on most recent activity first (e.g. newest value received).
values.INACTIVITY: Sort assets on least recent activity first (e.g. longest no value received).
values.TYPE_ASC: Sort alphabetically on the asset type, in ascending order.
values.TYPE_DESC: Sort alphabetically on the asset type, in descending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_WELL_ASC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'well', in ascending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_WELL_DESC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'well', in descending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_SITE_ASC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'site', in ascending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_SITE_DESC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'site', in descending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_PRODUCTION_AREA_ASC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'production_area', in ascending order.
values.TAG_TYPE_PRODUCTION_AREA_DESC: Sort alphabetically on any tags of type 'production_area', in descending order.
